Pre-Game Insights: South Africa played their first game against Zimbabwe in which they were in a comfortable position to snatch the match but rain played a spoiler and the match went to no result in the end.

Bangladesh won their first match of Super 12 stage against Netherlands where their batting missed out chances to build some big partnership and played big inning, but their bowling did a quite predictable work.
Others: This article provides a preview of the upcoming T20 World Cup match between Bangladesh and South Africa, discusses the teams' previous performances, and offers a prediction for the match.
